title: LAP: Democracy, Repression, and the Defense of Human Rights (English)
description: Tomas Ocampo, Outreach Coordinator for Latin American Perspectives, interviews special guest editors William Avilés and Leila Celis on the subject of the September 2017 issue: "Democracy, Repression, and the Defense of Human Rights."
content:encoded: Tomas Ocampo, Outreach Coordinator for Latin American Perspectives, interviews special guest editors William Avilés and Leila Celis on the subject of the September 2017 issue: "Democracy, Repression, and the Defense of Human Rights."
itunes:subtitle: Tomas Ocampo, Outreach Coordinator for Latin American Perspectives, interviews special guest editors William Avilés and Leila Celis on the subject of the September 2017 issue: "Democracy, Repression, and the Defense of Human Rights."
